GisSemaphore.h File Reference

Go to the source code of this file.


Classes

class  GisSemaphore
 GisSemaphore is a semaphore class. It is used to prevent operations from happening concurrently or re-entrantly. GisSemaphore is not currently part of the GIS API but can be added if there is a demand. It is a wrapper class around a boolean semaphore. More...

Typedefs

typedef GisPtr< GisSemaphore > GisSemaphoreP
 GisSemaphoreP is a GisPtr on GisSemaphore, provided for convenience.
